recommendations.text: Create comprehensive comparison pages on Taxbuddy's website, pitting its features directly against competitors like ClearTax and Tax2Win, highlighting USPs.
Develop in-depth, user-centric content around common tax scenarios (e.g., capital gains, F&O trading) showcasing how Taxbuddy provides superior solutions.
Actively pursue mentions and backlinks from authoritative financial and tech review sites for 'best tax software India' by offering exclusive insights or data.
